tr.td: W&J wins toss; defers. TMC to receive. W&J to kick right to left.
Eric Eberle kickoff 57 yards to the TMC13, Landon Savoy return 9 yards to the TMC22 (Pat Fening).
Kendall Owens rush for 3 yards to the TMC25 (Nathan Melhorn;Matthew Gal), PENALTY W&J offside (Frank Gigler) 5 yards to the TMC27, NO PLAY.
